title: Need a riot employees help
body:
The day before I was banned, I was in a dynamic queue with the #1 rammus on his smurf account and some other silver/gold players. He was queuing with viewers of his stream (not being paid to boost). We played about 5-6 games before we all went to bed or to do other stuff. The next day coming home from school, i logged into my account and found it was "permanently suspended." The account had 0 offenses prior to the ban. Riot refuses to tell me exactly what I was banned for, I'm accused of either scripting or using a 3rd party exploit. I've sent in a ticket and replied multiple times trying to get a riot employee to do their job of investigating my account (not just keeping me banned because another employee decided to ban me.) I HAVE NOT SCRIPTED AND I HAVE NOT USED A 3RD PARTY EXPLOIT. I didn't even climb to my previous elo because i was banned in promos. I need a riot employee or someone who can get a riot employee to get rid of my falsified ban.

Message me in game @ "1lettername" if you can help me get unbanned or have information to help me out.
My banned account name is "kittykittybangme" (give proper investigation on this account if your a riot employee)
The #1 rammus is willing to vouch for me, message me in game for his username.
(no one in the dynamic queue was banned besides me, probably because i main heimerdinger)
(no one else has, or ever had my login info)

replies.body: good luck working with riot support....or getting anyone to respond lmao.

hey that's not fair, riot support always responds

4 days later

with a generic copy pasted response that has nothing to do with your issue

but they respond :^)
Wish I could give this 40000 upvotes
make 40,000 accounts

> [{quoted}](name=themachamp,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=f7E9WQx7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-28T06:34:47.549+0000)
>
> good luck working with riot support....or getting anyone to respond lmao.

The support team is very nice don't bad mouth them

> [{quoted}](name=Daxter420,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=f7E9WQx7,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-04-29T00:35:18.028+0000)
>
> The support team is very nice don't bad mouth them

Nice has nothing to do with speed and accuracy. USPS can have some of the nicest people delivering the mail.....doesn't mean it wont take 3 weeks to get to you XD

Contacting player support is the correct path. You said you've already done that, so you just need to wait. The ticket needs to be routed to the correct people who deal with situations like yours. This is a small team of specialists, so be patient.

As a side note, it appears you were banned or 3rd party exploits/scripts, so this would likely have nothing to do with queueing with anyone in particular.

My tickets are getting no useful help.  Riot refuses to tell me what 3rd party exploits/scripts i was using so my other accounts are still at risk for getting banned since I don't know how to change anything.  The only thing that was different was me climbing somewhat fast since i was in a dynamic queue with a master tier smurf mixed in it.  Also i installed replay hub on overwolf around that time.  Besides that I have no idea of anything considered reportable in any way.  Riot says they are not removing the ban and they will not be telling me what to change to not get banned on other accounts.

They are not going to tell you what exploits/scripts were used.

I do not work on the team who deals with this, but I have never heard of a single false positive. It does not have anything to do with dynamic queue, people you played with, or how fast you climbed.

Most people I see dispute the punishment paid people to boost their account or lent their account to a friend, who used exploits.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/tips-tricks/RE7XxFM8-dont-use-this-sion-ult-mechanic-or-youll-get-banned?show=flat&page=11

Here's one for ya.

i dont understand why im not allowed to be told what i did. If i did it i would already know. Why the fuck am i not allowed to know.  "paid people to boost their account" i was duoing with a master tier smurf without paying him.  He was helping viewers.  You havent heard of a false positive because you refuse to admit it.  If you want people to follow the rules they need to know what they were banned for.  You guys can't just ban for fun.

> [{quoted}](name=1lettername,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=f7E9WQx7,comment-id=000b000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T04:48:58.656+0000)
>
> He was helping viewers.




**HELPING** is what was wrong. This guy is **HELPING** you climb elo, therefore boosting.




_correct me if im wrong :P_
funny how riot is hiding from this post. But when someone praises them. they're right there taking it {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Okay I don't exactly think this is fair.

He can only get his account by certain Rioters whose job it is to do that shit.

If someone says "Wow thanks Riot for all the hard work you do", that's somewhat of a general statement, so anyone can reply to it.

Riot works in sections, and those in the art and story department (Most of the people that come here) may not be able to investigate things like this.

Also, this thread has been up for 10 hours... That's relatively short when you consider sleep and work that these Riot employees have to go through on top of an investigation on THIS SPECIFIC PLAYER'S account.

sort of odd you got banned. heimer and blitz games for days, then suddenly you show up with morgana (support I'd imagine).

But the name, I'm surprised you didn't get a namechange over that. not sure sexual innuendoes are proper for accounts, maybe that?


but I hope you find some resolution to this...it seems odd.
The morgana games are not out of no where. My champions are pretty similar throughout three of my accounts.
Hard truth Blizzard support > riot support

True they have better support than Riots. Since when my account was starting to be hacked since I couldn't at all play Heroes Alpha one time and the person at Blizzard was nice funny and roleplayed as Jim Raynor the whole time.
Runescape used to have good support.  I was friends with a person in customer support and had my account locked while someone was hacking me.  Saved enough money to rebuild.
Send support tickets.
I have sent one and I have been messaging between 4 different employees with no results.

> [{quoted}](name=1lettername,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=f7E9WQx7,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-28T07:08:34.267+0000)
>
> I have sent one and I have been messaging between 4 different employees with no results.

sounds about right. It's the luck of the draw if any rioter will ever see this. Maybe try bumping this during peak hours? Only people working now are techs really.

Good luck mate, the entire player support team and lyte are jerking off to lytes PhD while a bot goes around banning people who get triggered by people trolling, intentionally feeding, rage quiting, afking, and 4v5's in genereal.

I have had a very good experience with Riot support on several occasions.  No, it did not always work out the way I wanted to or agreed with but they did respond.  A good way to look at it is this...If you had a game in existence that people were playing, you don't want to go around banning people for no good reason.  That means less players not more.  That makes sense does it not?

One more thing to think about is this.  The majority of people who are accused of doing something, deny it...
Enjoy ur ban for the 3rd party cheating u did 6 months ago. That's how Rito does it

I didn't 3rd party cheat at anytime.  Riot tantrum is hinting i paid a booster.  Even though i told them i was dynamic queue with a master smurf who was helping twitch viewers for free.  I climbed to gold on 2 accounts before stopping ranked for last season, now im banned in gold promos.

>(no one in the dynamic queue was banned besides me, probably because i main heimerdinger)

and that's why you are banned
you know that using those turrets require heimerdinger to script their actions right right?
and as a good scientist, he does just that. Sadly, riot's automatically ban system found heimerdinger out, so now they are dishing bans
Heimerdinger definantly does not script turrets.  When ever 2 people are within range and one is about to die, it switches to attacking the full health tank.
did you have any macro keys that you used?
I don't even know how to set those up.
Was it ranked?
It was my smurf.  I used it to play ranked, so my main could be low elo and easily get S rating for crates and play with my low elo friends.  It was also 1 game from being back in gold.
y
Same

hello everybody I just wonder why riot don't give a metal to people who had more than 5k wins I have 5091 wins or a special border for your icon picture that would be nice I been playing since season 1 my sumoner name is anthonyr32 thank you very much

hello everybody I just wonder why riot don't give a metal to people who had more than 5k wins I have 5091 wins or a special border for your icon picture that would be nice I been playing since season 1 my sumoner name is anthonyr32 thank you very much

hello everybody I just wonder why riot don't give a metal to people who had more than 5k wins I have 5091 wins or a special border for your icon picture that would be nice I been playing since season 1 my sumoner name is anthonyr32 thank you very much
"Not being paid to boost" the fact that you needed to put that forward makes me wonder if you might not already have some idea about what happened here.
As i put in my ticket to riot, i was playing with the #1 rammus on his smurf.  He was playing with viewers of his twitch while practicing champions in low elo.
